p: HPLC-grade solvents and reagents: acetonitrile, methanol, tetrahydrofuran and n-hexane were purchased from Honeywell (Morris Plains, USA). Dimethyl sulfoxide and phosphoric acid were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St Louis, USA) and Chron Chemicals (Chengdu, China), respectively. Ultrapure water was freshly produced using a Milli-Q plus Advantage A10 system (Molsheim, France).
